places_with_reviews.name: Shree Gayatri Mataji Temple Kalol
places_with_reviews.address: 6FWP+G45, Pratap Pura Village, Kalol, Gujarat 382721, India

reviews.text:
This is a temple of Mother Gayatri and a temple of Mahadev near this temple.
There is also a garden here.
There is also available parking facility.
This place is very beautiful.
Gayatri Mata mandir kalol super please and visit for your family and friends
Very Peaceful Temple ...and awesome one.
Nice temple and places
In this premise you can arrange your holly Havan and manage Marriage, Ring ceremony and many more family functions.

places_with_reviews.name: Kapileshwar Mahadev Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: 9,Vakahariya nagar, near kapleshwar temple, Vardhaman Nagar, Kalol, Gujarat 382721, India

reviews.text: Don't expect much on having a Rs. 70 thali that too unlimited. But other than that, a nice place to visit with family and enjoy in gardens, mandirs and a lake in making
All Temples are there & Nice Piece full place

Nice place for devotion and meditation. pure natural place.very old temple but renovation and known As mini Somnath,Nice maintain garden,Parking andfood court available with REASONABLE rate with good quality.sai and Shani dev temple Is in Same premises.
That's a good place and there's atmosphere is next level

Om Namah Shivay 🙏🏻
religious place for devotion and meditation. pure natural place.very old temple but renovated and known As mini Somnath,Nice maintained garden. sai baba and Shani dev temple Is in Same premises.

places_with_reviews.name: Hanuman Temple
places_with_reviews.address: 6FMV+4J3, Panchvati Area., NR Jayvir Society, Ambika Nagar, Kalol, Gujarat 382721, India

reviews.text: Hanuman Temple is famous place for Panchvati area. It is located in heart of PANCHVATI AREA. Centre location in the area. Its famous as PANCHVATI circle. Every event, market set here.

This is "Ram Doot Hanumanji Temple" and called Hanumanji Mandir.
It's located in Panchavati area of Kalol.
Very good religious place.
Satsang and other religious activities going on here.
Nice place for mental peace. Small garden also here.
Place is very neat & Clean.
Our daily rutine for pray to Hanuman Dada in this temple
Very peaceful place

Peaceful just like all other temples and religious place... Has a little private garden in front of it where the owner doesn't mind if you sit for a bit... Temple is covered by roads on both sides so take care when crossing...
Good
Nice residential area near highway
Near highway many people living in flate
Car Parking Not Available For Gest
Good residency area

places_with_reviews.name: BAPS Swaminarayan Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: 6FJW+2FV, Tirupati Society, Ambika Nagar, Kalol, Gujarat 382725, India

reviews.text: The place where people find internal peace and true presence

Baps swaminarayan temple is located at sarangpur.which is favorite place of respected pramukh swami Maharaj.here there is a big temple of kastbhanjan Dev Hanuman ji .whish is manage by baps swaminarayan temple.
Samadhi of pramukh swami Maharaj is here.
There are lot of rooms available here for staying.and this is  very devotional place .

Excellent place of lord Swaminarayan in Kalol.
Situated in Panchvati Area.
Spreaded in vast area.
Dining area also available.
Weekly satsang and sabha organize here.
Hall also available for family function.

Jay Swaminarayan,
I love this Temple hope of heaven. This temple build by St. Shri Pramukh Swami and Dr. Swami. This temple located in Panchvati Area, Kalol, Gandhinagar. All nearest villages and city people comes for pray and attend Weekly Shabha and specially Weekly Ravisabha for young child.

Jay Swaminarayan,

Very old shiv temple in kalol city outside on piyaj village road. Parking area is very good.yagn shala available for religious havan and pooja.small garden there for children playing and good time spand.nagdevta and baliyadev temple also in premises.

It's very old and sacred place
.... must visit in shravan month. In shravan every monday there is fair and lots of people visit the temple
Nilang make ABP 160 TPH Plant in Fortune Builders, Kalol

Oldest shiv temple in kalol...
Must visit this place one time
Relatively small temple...but good ambience

places_with_reviews.name: Swaminarayan Mandir Kalol(Narnarayan Dev Gadi)
places_with_reviews.address: Near Shayog Society, Hanuman Temple, Sahyog Society, Panchavati, Ambika Nagar, Kalol, Gujarat 382721, India

reviews.text:
Very beautiful temple of lord Shree Swaminarayan under kalupur gadi.
Very nice murti darshan of Gopinathji and Nar-Narayan dev.
You will feel clam and peaceful on entering the temple.
A must visit place for Swaminarayan devotees.
Jay Shree Swaminarayan.
Beautiful Temple of Lord Swaminarayan

This temple is very beutiful. Everytime we go there we feel Bhagwan Swaminarayan is there. This temple has the original gyry parampara Bhagwan Swaminarayan has given us. It is under Shree Narnarayandev Gadi. It is built new recently with nice shikarbandh Mandir.
Peaceful place. You feel to touch god
Good spiritual place located in centre of PANCHVATI area. KALOL. so I like this temple and I often visit here. But one problem is parking.

Good place to visit near borishna gam
Quite place
Every Sunday Fair
Nice place, you can rest there and take blessings of Jogni maa..
Jay shree Ram
Nice work 👏

Jay jogani ma
Nice temple

places_with_reviews.name: Someshwar Mahadev Temple
places_with_reviews.address: NR Jayvir Society,, 6FPQ+2J3, NR Jayvir Society, Panchavati, Ambika Nagar, Kalol, Gujarat 382721, India

reviews.text:
Peaceful place to spend time with lord shiva.
If you are a grandparent then do visit with your grandchildren & both of you will never forget this place.

Also i notice only this place in entire gujrat is holding his prayer in hindi.

Morning 5.45-6.00 prayer must be attand once.

god of shiva temple very Nice place.common ground and all ritual follows there.in month of shravan and any festival crowd found there.Only Parking PROBLEM there.No Parking zone available.Main road side
Fully adhyatmik feelings there. Vibe are very good
Good
Local meeting point for senior citizens and arrange good spiritual functions.
Jay Matri Mata. The Almighty Goddess Matri Mata blessed me well.
Very positive atmosphere and energy.
It is my maternal kuldevi temple and I am having faith in Matari mata.
Hindu Barot and Brahmbhatt and Rao community goddess Temple.
